original_title: Sri Lanka excise duties for cars, sin taxes for alcohol, baccy and sweet drinks from Jan
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has published excise taxes imposed from January 01, on alcohol, tobacco, sugar drinks, consumer durables and vehicles in a gazette notice.
Vehicles are taxed based on engine capacity or up to 300 percent in some categories.
Mineral waters are taxed at 29 rupees a litre, sweet drinks 14 rupees a litre or 34 cents per gram.
Petrol is taxed at 72 rupees a litre and diesel 57 rupees a litre. (Colombo/Jan05/2023)
